title: Revised Project Scope and Requirements: Define for Neural Network Energy Trading System
description: This RFC aims to gather, document, prioritize, and clarify the project requirements for an AI system that optimizes energy trading in decentralized energy markets. Key aspects include defining trading strategies (including long-short, mean reversion, and machine learning algorithms), identifying market data sources (real-time energy prices, historical data, weather forecasts, etc.), outlining system constraints (e.g., computational power, data storage capacity, real-time processing requirements), establishing success criteria (e.g., profit margin improvement, reduced energy waste), setting scope boundaries (clearly defining what is and isn't included in the project), addressing potential risks and benefits of each requirement, considering alternative solutions or approaches when necessary, and documenting interdependencies between requirements. Upon completion, the findings will be presented to the team for discussion and consensus. If approved, the revised requirements document will be prepared.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the neural network model, data pipeline, and integration with energy markets. Define the system components and their interactions.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data pipeline to collect and preprocess energy market data, including supply, demand, and pricing information from various sources.

title: Build Neural Network Model
description: Develop and train the neural network model for energy trading optimization, using the preprocessed data from the data pipeline.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Implement Trading Strategies and Market Integration
description: Develop the trading strategies and algorithms based on the neural network model's predictions. Integrate with decentralized energy markets for executing trades.

title: Develop User Interface and Monitoring
description: Design and implement a user interface for monitoring the system's performance, visualizing trading activities, and configuring trading parameters.

title: Set up Infrastructure and Deployment
description: Provision and configure the necessary infrastructure for hosting the application, including servers, databases, and networking components. Establish deployment pipelines and automation scripts.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Assess potential security risks and implement appropriate measures to secure the system, including data encryption, access controls, and auditing mechanisms.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests. Ensure the system meets the defined requirements and quality standards.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
Implement Trading Strategies and Market Integration

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides to facilitate system maintenance and user onboarding.
